meanings.definition: The slopes of a mountain or hill.
meanings.sent1: The skiers glided down the gentle versants of the snowy mountain.
meanings.sent2: We hiked up the steep versants to reach the summit.
meanings.sent3: The sheep happily grazed on the lush versants, enjoying the fresh grass.
meanings.sent4: The shadows danced on the versants as the sun began to set behind the peak.
meanings.sent5: The colorful wildflowers bloomed along the versants, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The sides of a valley or ravine.
meanings.sent1: The river flowed between the rocky versants of the deep valley.
meanings.sent2: The echo bounced off the steep versants of the narrow ravine.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous explorers climbed the rugged versants, seeking hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight illuminated the dark versants, casting eerie shadows.
meanings.sent5: The birds nested among the verdant versants, chirping happily in the morning.
